# Bitcoin maximalists are needed to remind folks that maximum decentralization, ‘permissionless’ and censorship resistance are key to keeping the revolution alive. Keep in mind, every post-BTC coin is less-than. Competition is great, but the revolution can’t be stopped.
To assert that someone like @ BillGates is “too old” to understand the crypto space is akin to cognitive dissonance. When he was cheering Bitcoin on a few years ago, everyone was praising him.
Gates is not entirely wrong. Without sufficient utility and declining transactions, the risk of Bitcoin becoming subject to greater fool theory has increased.

Bitcoin is a digital currency that is decentralized. Because of its decentralize nature, nobody (company or government) can censor or reverse any transactions. Bitcoin also solves the double spend problem, which means that you can't create bitcoins out of thin air.

Supplemental Notes: This is a demonstration of how to read the NVT charts, it's not meant as a price call for your trading, always trade to your own strategy. NVT Signal: http://charts.woobull.com/bitcoin-nvt-signal/ … NVT Ratio: http://charts.woobull.com/bitcoin-nvt-ratio/ … /9

Refresher. NVT values BTC as if it's a payment network like PayPal or Visanet, you can use the value flowing through the network as a proxy for earning and therefore network valuation. This holds true for Bitcoin's network too. https://woobull.com/introducing-nvt-ratio-bitcoins-pe-ratio-use-it-to-detect-bubbles/ … /2
